momentum.from sentence: Training is carried out by mini-batch stochastic gradient descent (SGD) with a momentum of 0.9 and a gradient clipping of 5.0.

gradient clipping.from sentence: Training is carried out by mini-batch stochastic gradient descent (SGD) with a momentum of 0.9 and a gradient clipping of 5.0.

both datasets.from sentence: The mini-batch is 10 for both datasets, and learning rates are 0.009 and 0.013 for CONLL and ONTONOTES respectively.

CoNLL.from sentence: The mini-batch is 10 for both datasets, and learning rates are 0.009 and 0.013 for CONLL and ONTONOTES respectively.

OntoNotes.from sentence: The mini-batch is 10 for both datasets, and learning rates are 0.009 and 0.013 for CONLL and ONTONOTES respectively.

varied.from sentence: We varied dropout ([0:25; 0:5; 0:65]), hidden units ([50; 128; 256; 300]), capitalization ([10; 20; 30]) and char ([25; 50; 100]) embedding dimensions, learning rate ([0:001; 0:015] by step 0:002), and optimization algorithms and fixed the other hyper-parameters.

implemented.from sentence: We implemented our system using the Tensorflow (Abadi et al., 2016) library, and ran our models on a GeForce GTX TITAN Xp GPU.

ran.from sentence: We implemented our system using the Tensorflow (Abadi et al., 2016) library, and ran our models on a GeForce GTX TITAN Xp GPU.
